Name: ChucK
Creator: Mac OS X, Linux, Windows
Most recent update: Unified timing mechanism (no separation between audio-rate and control-rate), command-line access

Name: Csound
Creator: Mac OS X, Linux, Windows
First release date: C; also Python, Java, Lisp, Lua, Tcl, C++
Most recent update: IDE (QuteCsound), multitrack interface (blue); several analysis/resynthesis facilities; can compute double-precision audio; Python and LuaJIT algorithmic composition library; multi-threaded processing

Name: Impromptu
Creator: Mac OS X
Most recent update: Native access to most OS X APIs including Core Image, Quartz, QuickTime and OpenGL.  Impromptu also includes its own statically typed (inferencing) systems language for heavy numeric processing - OpenGL, RT AudioDSP etc..

Name: Max/MSP
Creator: Mac OS X, Windows
First release date: C, Java, JavaScript, also Python and Ruby via externals

Name: Pure Data
Creator: Mac OS X, Linux, Windows, iPod, Android
First release date: C, C++, FAUST, Haskell, Java, Lua, Python, Q, Ruby, Scheme, others

Name: SuperCollider
Creator: Mac OS X, Linux, Windows, FreeBSD
Most recent update: Client-server architecture; client and server can be used independently, command-line access
